EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Greenplum Summit_New Jersey_Q118.GP Summit - Three - 3/27
EmailTemplate.subject: Hear from Morgan Stanley, Conversant and more at Greenplum Summit @ PostgresConf
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://greenplumsummit.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=gp-summit-3-q118]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
I’m Scott Yara, SVP of Products at Pivotal and cofounder of Greenplum, a massively parallel implementation of Postgres. How you envision the future of data technology will underscore the Greenplum Summit <[[http://greenplumsummit.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=gp-summit-3-q118]]> content at PostgresConf US 2018 <[[https://postgresconf.org/conferences/2018]]>. At my keynote, I’m excited to talk about how data tells the story of what’s next—in battling fraud, saving lives, education, customer service, safer cities, and better health.
Join me April 16–20 in Jersey City to hear from senior data and analytics experts about how they are leveraging the power of Postgres and Greenplum’s massive scalability for business innovation. Check out these session highlights:
A Pivotal Moment on Wall Street <[[https://postgresconf.org/conferences/2018/program/proposals/test-afa2ad48-dcfd-435a-a3df-f6684c56d810]]> Howard Goldberg, Head of Greenplum Engineering, Morgan Stanley
Greenplum for Internet Scale Analytics and Mining <[[https://postgresconf.org/conferences/2018/program/proposals/greenplum-summit-am-session-2]]> Shaun Litt, Principal Data Platform Architect, Conversant
Executive Panel: Massive Analytical Power Based on Postgres <[[https://postgresconf.org/conferences/2018/program/proposals/greenplum-summit-executive-panel]]> Stephen O’Grady, Principal Analyst & Cofounder, Redmonk Howard Goldberg, Head of Greenplum Engineering, Morgan Stanley Shaun Litt, Principal Data Platform Architect, Conversant.
Save 25% off your conference pass A single pass gives you full access to both PostgresConf and Greenplum Summit. Use code 2018_GPDB to get a 25% discount when you register <[[https://postgresconf.org/conferences/2018/buytickets]]>. Stay connected Join the conversation on Twitter #DataTellsTheStory <[[https://twitter.com/hashtag/datatellsthestory]]>, and follow @PivotalData <[[https://twitter.com/PivotalData]]> for news and updates. I hope to see you there, Scott
